public java.lang.String readMessage(java.lang.String urlstr,
                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params,
                                    java.lang.String encoding)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Converts the map to an array and uses only the values

Specified by:
readMessage in interface ServiceReader
Parameters:
urlstr - the source of the service
params - the params to pass to the server
encoding - the encoding to use for the values. If null then will use the system encoding
Returns:
the response of the service
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the connection is not established

read

public static java.lang.String read(java.lang.String urlStr,
                                    java.lang.String encoding,
                                    java.lang.Object... args)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Connects to a Restful service and returns the output as a String

Parameters:
urlStr - the service url in the form http://[host]:[port] (without a / in the end)
encoding - the encoding to use
args - the args to pass so the resultant url is http://[host]:[port]/arg1/arg2/...
Returns:
the service message
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if there is a problem with the connection
